title: When Does the CLT Apply?
question_text: Each answer choice describes the shape of the population distribution and the sample size, $n$ for a sampling distribution. We are not assured of a nearly normal sampling distribution for which choice?

choices.text: Nearly normal population distribution; n = 12 n = 12
Nearly normal population distribution; n = 48 n = 48
Skewed left population distribution; n = 83 n = 83
